Wednesday, November 15, 2006

Interview with David from Canada on Rails

Posted by David

Better late than never, the InfoQ team has finally released an interview done with yours truly back in April at Canada on Rails. It includes questions like “How long until you are the vendor?” and “WS-* is that bullshit?” and many more fun themes. The questioner is Obie Fernandez.
